msbt.message: Toy Day's gettin' close, so everybody is runnin' around gettin' presents or whatever else. They're sure makin' a racket, but I can't say I really blame 'em. I'm doin' the same thing, !
Beginnin' to look a lot like Toy Day, huh? You got all your gifts ready for the big exchange, ? Don't forget the wrapping paper! It's gotta be "present"-able, right? GAHAHAHA!
You see the tree in the plaza? They really outdid themselves with all them lights and decorations! Thing like that'd put anybody in the Toy Day spirit, even a crusty ol' like me, .
